respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Compare with TLG text for missing words or other scanner omissions.
tagged corrupt words with the NOPARSE tag; see the text log for a list. changed *afrodi/ths to *)afrodi/ths

$Log: aesch.supp_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.6 2013-06-13 12:41:17 gcrane tagging now should be compatible with CTS
Revision 1.5 2011-09-07 12:30:31 rsingh04 adding rend attribute to lb tags which are numbered
Revision 1.4 2011-01-13 03:38:22 gcrane more refinements making these files SDL compatible
Revision 1.3 2010-12-25 19:15:19 gcrane now using LB milestones rather than L tags
Revision 1.2 2010-12-24 12:39:25 gcrane ADD tags replace lt/gt entities DEL tags replace lsqb/rsqb entities GAP tags replace "..."
Revision 1.1 2010-12-24 11:56:44 gcrane base SDL file
Revision 1.2 2010/06/24 15:41:00 gcrane edits to improve named entities
Revision 1.1 2009/10/09 19:49:18 rsingh04 more reorganizing of texts module by collection
Revision 1.1 2009/10/07 20:59:53 rsingh04 began reorganizing texts module by collection. created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files
Revision 1.3 2005/08/01 15:44:56 packel really removed item tags
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 15:32:41 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:27:32 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.8 2004/04/21 20:28:10 mimno added card 1s
Revision 1.7 2003/07/01 22:14:26 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.6 2000/03/04 20:33:49 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.5 2000/02/17 17:46:03 amahoney use n on sp for speeches interrupted by cardbreaks; put cards at ends of such speeches after the close tag; put sp and speaker tags on the divs of the choruses, which were not marked at all (but div2 closes sp, so we lost the speaker info)
Revision 1.4 1999/12/23 18:19:40 amahoney convert to P3

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/n' a)\n ou)=n xw/ran eu)/frona ma=llon
w)= po/lis, w)= gh=, kai\ leuko\n u(/dwr,
pri\n po/da xe/rsw| th= d' e)n a)sw/dei
pri/n pote le/ktrwn, w(=n qe/mis ei)/rgei,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ta\ d' a)/elpta/ per o)/nta fanei=tai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei) de\ kurei= tis pe/las oi)wnopo/lwn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: cunti/qhsi de\ paido\s mo/ron, w(s au)tofo/nws

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pi/ptei d' a)sfale\s ou)d' e)pi\ nw/tw|,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: qeoi=s d' e)nage/a te/lea pelome/nwn kalw=s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: qe/lousa d' au)= qe/lousan a(gna/ m'

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: pai=des, fronei=n xrh/: cu\n fronou=nti d' h(/kete
pistw=| ge/ronti tw=| de nauklh/rw| patri/.
kai\ ta)pi\ xe/rsou nu=n promhqi/an labw\n
leu/ssw, cu\n i(/ppois kampu/lois t' o)xh/masin:
ta/x' a)\n pro\s h(ma=s th=sde gh=s a)rxhge/tai
a)ll' ei)/t' a)ph/mwn ei)/te kai\ teqhgme/nos
w)mh=| cu\n o)rgh=| to/nd' e)po/rnutai sto/lon,
a)/meino/n e)sti panto\s ei(/nek', w)= ko/rai,
krei=sson de\ pu/rgou bwmo/s, a)/rrhkton sa/kos
a)ll' w(s ta/xista ba=te, kai\ leukostefei=s
ai)doi=a kai\ goedna\ kai\ zaxrei=' e)/ph
fqoggh=| d' e(pe/sqw prw=ta me\n to\ mh\ qrasu/,
to\ mh\ ma/taion d' e)k metwposwfro/nwn
kai\ mh\ pro/lesxos mhd' e)folko\s e)n lo/gw|
ge/nh|. to\ th=|de ka/rt' e)pi/fqonon ge/nos.
me/mnhso d' ei)/kein: xrei=os ei)= ce/nh fuga/s.
qrasustomei=n ga\r ou) pre/pei tou\s h(/ssonas.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: qe/loim' a)\n h)/dh soi\ pe/las qro/nous e)/xein.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: mh/ nun sxo/laze, mhxanh=s d' e)/stw kra/tos.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: a(gno/n t' *)apo/llw, fuga/d' a)p' ou)ranou= qeo/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei)dw\s a)\n ai)=san th/nde suggnoi/h brotoi=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/n' ou)=n kiklh/|skw tw=nde daimo/nwn e)/ti;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' eu)= t' e)/pemyen eu)= te deca/sqw xqoni/.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: se/besq': e)n a(gnw=| d' e(smo\s w(s peleia/dwn
o)/rniqos o)/rnis pw=s a)\n a(gneu/oi fagw/n;
pw=s d' a)\n gamw=n a)/kousan a)/kontos pa/ra
a(gno\s ge/noit' a)/n; ou)de\ mh\ 'n *(/aidou qanw\n
o(/pws a)\n u(mi=n pra=gos eu)= nika=| to/de.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: o(/pws de\ xw/ran ou)/te khru/kwn u(/po,
kla/doi ge me\n dh\ kata\ no/mous a)fikto/rwn
kei=ntai par' u(mi=n pro\s qeoi=s a)gwni/ois:
kai\ ta)/lla po/ll' e)/t' ei)ka/sai di/kaion h)=n,
ei) mh\ paro/nti fqo/ggos h)=n o( shmanw=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)gw\ de\ pro\s se\ po/teron w(s e)/thn le/gw,
h)\ r(h/tor' i(erora/bdon, h)\ po/lews a)go/n;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: pro\s tau=t' a)mei/bou kai\ le/g' eu)qarsh\s e)moi/.
kai\ pa=san ai)=an, h(=s di' a(gno\s e)/rxetai
u(gra=s qala/sshs: tw=nde ta)pi\ ta/de kratw=.
mnh/mhn pot' a)nti/misqon hu(/ret' e)n litai=s.
e)/xousa d' h)/dh ta)p' e)mou= tekmh/ria
ge/nos t' a)\n e)ceu/xoio kai\ le/gois pro/sw.
makra/n ge me\n dh\ r(h=sin ou) ste/rgei po/lis.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: braxu\s toro/s q' o( mu=qos: *)argei=ai ge/nos
kai\ tau=t' a)lhqh= pa/nta prosfu/sw lo/gw|.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: a)/pista muqei=sq', w)= ce/nai, klu/ein e)moi/,
ei) tocoteuxei=s h)=te, ka/rt' a)\n h)/|kasa
u(ma=s. didaxqei\s d' a)\n to/d' ei)dei/hn ple/on,
o(/pws ge/neqlon spe/rma t' *)argei=on to\ so/n.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: h)=n w(s ma/lista, kai\ fa/tis pollh\ kratei=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mh\ kai\ lo/gos tis *zh=na meixqh=nai brotw=|;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pw=s ou)=n teleuta=| basile/wn nei/kh ta/de;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ dh=ta pro\s tau=t' a)/loxos i)sxura\ *dio/s;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: to\n pa/nq' o(rw=nta fu/lak' e)pe/sthsen boi/+.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ ou)=n e)/teucen a)/llo duspo/tmw| boi/+;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: toiga/r nin e)k gh=s h)/lasen makrw=| dro/mw|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ tau=t' e)/lecas pa/nta sugko/llws e)moi/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ *zeu/s g' e)fa/ptwr xeiri\ fitu/ei go/non.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ti/s ou)=n o( *di=os po/rtis eu)/xetai boo/s;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ti/n' ou)=n e)/t' a)/llon th=sde blasthmo\n le/geis;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: to\ pa/nsofon nu=n o)/noma tou=to/ moi fra/son.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: kai\ tou=d' a)/noige tou)/nom' a)fqo/nw| lo/gw|.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: dokei=te dh/ moi th=sde koinwnei=n xqono\s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: po/nou d' i)/dois a)\n ou)damou= tau)to\n ptero/n:
e)pei\ ti/s hu)/xei th/nd' a)ne/lpiston fugh\n
ke/lsein e)s *)/argos kh=dos e)ggene\s to\ pri/n,

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ti/ fh\s i(knei=sqai tw=nd' a)gwni/wn qew=n,

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: po/tera kat' e)/xqran, h)\ to\ mh\ qe/mis le/geis;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/s d' a)\n fi/lous w)noi=to tou\s kekthme/nous;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: sqe/nos me\n ou(/tws mei=zon au)/cetai brotoi=s.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: pw=s ou)=n pro\s u(ma=s eu)sebh\s e)gw\ pe/lw;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: bare/a su/ g' ei)=pas, po/lemon a)/rasqai ne/on.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' h( di/kh ge cumma/xwn u(perstatei=.

sp.speaker: basileu/s
sp.l: ei)/per g' a)p' a)rxh=s pragma/twn koinwno\s h)=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ai)dou= su\ pru/mnan po/leos w(=d' e)stemme/nhn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: i)/de me ta\n i(ke/tin fuga/da peri/dromon,

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ei)/h d' a)/naton pra=gma tou=t' a)stoce/nwn.
nei=kos ge/nhtai: tw=n ga\r ou) dei=tai po/lis.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: su\ de\ par' o)yigo/nou ma/qe geraio/frwn:

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: e)mw=n. to\ koino\n d' ei) miai/netai po/lis,
e)gw\ d' a)\n ou) krai/noim' u(po/sxesin pa/ros,
a)stoi=s de\ pa=si tw=nde koinw/sas pe/ri.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: su/ toi po/lis, su\ de\ to\ da/mion.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: a)/gos me\n ei)/h toi=s e)moi=s paligko/tois,
u(mi=n d' a)rh/gein ou)k e)/xw bla/bhs a)/ter.
ou)d' au)= to/d' eu)=fron, ta/sd' a)tima/sai lita/s.
a)mhxanw= de\ kai\ fo/bos m' e)/xei fre/nas
dra=sai/ te mh\ dra=sai/ te kai\ tu/xhn e(lei=n.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ei)=nai, ti/s a)\n toi=sd' a)ntiwqh=nai qe/loi;
dei= toi/ se feu/gein kata\ no/mous tou\s oi)/koqen,
w(s ou)k e)/xousin ku=ros ou)de\n a)mfi\ sou=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mh/ ti/ pot' ou)=n genoi/man u(poxei/rios

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ou)k eu)/kriton to\ kri=ma. mh/ m' ai(rou= krith/n.
ei)=pon de\ kai\ pri/n, ou)k a)/neu dh/mou ta/de
pra/caim' a)/n, ou)de/ per kratw=n, mh\ kai/ pote
ei)/ph| lew/s, ei)/ pou/ ti mh\ toi=on tu/xoi,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/dika me\n kakoi=s, o(/sia d' e)nno/mois.
ti/ tw=nd' e)c i)/sou r(epome/nwn metal-

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: o(/pws a)/nata tau=ta prw=ta me\n po/lei,
mh/t' e)n qew=n e(/draisin w(=d' i(drume/nas
o(\s ou)d' e)n *(/aidou to\n qano/nt' e)leuqeroi=.
mw=n ou) dokei= dei=n fronti/dos swthri/ou;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: sqei=san, w)= pa=n kra/tos e)/xwn xqono/s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mh/ ti tlh=|s ta\n i(ke/tin ei)sidei=n

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: i)/sqi ga/r: paisi\ ta/de kai\ do/mois,

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: kai\ dh\ pe/frasmai. deu=ro d' e)coke/lletai.
h)\ toi=sin h)\ toi=s po/lemon ai)/resqai me/gan
pa=s' e)/st' a)na/gkh, kai\ gego/mfwtai ska/fos
kai\ xrhma/twn me\n e)k do/mwn porqoume/nwn,
†a)/thn ge mei/zw kai\ me/g' e)mplh/sas go/mou†
kai\ glw=ssa toceu/sasa mh\ ta\ kai/ria,
o(/pws d' o(/maimon ai(=ma mh\ genh/setai,
dei= ka/rta qu/ein kai\ pesei=n xrhsth/ria
h)= ka/rta nei/kous tou=d' e)/sw paroi/xomai
qe/lw d' a)/idris ma=llon h)\ sofo\s kakw=n
ei)=nai. ge/noito d' eu)= para\ gnw/mhn e)mh/n.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: h)/kousa, kai\ le/gois a)/n. ou)/ me feu/cetai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)/xw stro/fous zw/nas te, sullaba\s pe/plwn

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ta/x' a)\n gunaici\ tau=ta sumpreph= pe/loi.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)k tw=nde toi/nun, i)/sqi, mhxanh\ kalh/—

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: le/con ti/n' au)dh\n th/nde ghruqei=s' e)/sh|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei) mh/ ti pisto\n tw=|d' u(posth/seis sto/lw|—

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)k tw=nd' o(/pws ta/xist' a)pa/gcasqai qew=n.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: kakw=n de\ plh=qos potamo\s w(\s e)pe/rxetai:
a)/ths d' a)/busson pe/lagos ou) ma/l' eu)/poron
ei) me\n ga\r u(mi=n mh\ to/d' e)kpra/cw xre/os,
ei) d' au)=q' o(mai/mois paisi\n *ai)gu/ptou se/qen
staqei\s pro\ teixe/wn dia\ ma/xhs h(/cw te/lous,
i(kth=ros: u(/yistos ga\r e)n brotoi=s fo/bos.
su\ me/n, pa/ter geraie\ tw=nde parqe/nwn,
kla/dous te tou/tous ai)=y' e)n a)gka/lais labw\n
qe/s, w(s i)/dwsi th=sd' a)fi/cews te/kmar
e)mou=: kat' a)rxh=s ga\r filai/tios lew/s.
kai\ ga\r ta/x' a)/n tis oi)kti/sas i)dw\n ta/de
u(mi=n d' a)\n ei)/h dh=mos eu)mene/steros:
toi=s h(/ssosin ga\r pa=s tis eu)noi/as fe/rei.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: cu/mpemyon, w(s a)\n tw=n polissou/xwn qew=n
eu(/rwmen, a)sfa/leia d' h)=| di' a)/stews
stei/xousi: morfh=s d' ou)x o(mo/stolos fu/sis.
tre/fei. fu/lacai mh\ qra/sos te/kh| fo/bon:
kai\ dh\ fi/lon tis e)/ktan' a)gnoi/as u(/po.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: stei/xoit' a)/n, a)/ndres: eu)= ga\r o( ce/nos le/gei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: tou/tw| me\n ei)=pas, kai\ tetagme/nos ki/oi:
e)gw\ de\ pw=s drw=; pou= qra/sos ne/meis e)moi/;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: kla/dous me\n au)tou= lei=pe, shmei=on po/nou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ dh/ sfe lei/pw xeiri\ kai\ lo/gois se/qen.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: leuro\n kat' a)/lsos nu=n e)pistre/fou to/de.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ pw=s be/bhlon a)/lsos a)\n r(u/oito/ me;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)/toi ti qau=ma dusforei=n fo/bw| freno/s.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: a)ei/ g' a)/narkto/n e)sti dei=m' e)cai/sion.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: su\ kai\ le/gwn eu)/fraine kai\ pra/sswn fre/na.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: a)ll' ou)/ti daro\n xro/non e)rhmw/sei path/r.
stei/xw, to\ koino\n w(s a)\n eu)mene\s tiqw=:
kai\ so\n dida/cw pate/ra poi=a xrh\ le/gein.
pro\s tau=ta mi/mne kai\ qeou\s e)gxwri/ous
litai=s paraitou= tw=n s' e)/rws e)/xei tuxei=n.
peiqw\ d' e(/poito kai\ tu/xh prakth/rios.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: brotoi\ d', oi(\ ga=s to/t' h)=san e)/nnomoi
ta\n d' au)= gunaiko/s: te/ras d' e)qa/mboun.
kai\ to/te dh\ ti/s h)=n o( qe/l-

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: *dio\s to/d' e)/rgon kai\ to/d' a)\n ge/nos le/gwn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: au)to\s o( path\r futourgo\s au)to/xeir a)/nac

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: u(p' a)rxa=s d' ou)/ tinos qoa/zwn
speu=sai/ ti tw=n bou/lios fe/rei frh/n.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: qarsei=te pai=des. eu)= ta\ tw=n e)gxwri/wn:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w)= xai=re pre/sbu, fi/ltat' a)gge/llwn e)moi/
e)/nispe d' h(mi=n poi= keku/rwtai te/los,

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: a)ll' w(/st' a)nhbh=sai/ me ghraia=| freni/:
kai\ mh/t' e)noi/kwn mh/t' e)phlu/dwn tina\
a)/gein: e)a\n de\ prostiqh=| to\ kartero/n,
toia/nd' e)/peiqen r(h=sin a)mf' h(mw=n le/gwn
po/lin paxu=nai, ceniko\n a)stiko/n q' a(/ma
le/gwn diplou=n mi/asma pro\ po/lews fane\n
e)/kran' a)/neu klhth=ros w(s ei)=nai ta/de.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: to\ pa=n t' e)k daimo/nwn la/xoien.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: qeou\s d', oi(\ ga=n e)/xousin a)ei\

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: eu)xa\s me\n ai)nw= ta/sde sw/fronas, fi/lai.
u(mei=s de\ mh\ tre/sht' a)kou/sasai patro\s
i(ketado/kou ga\r th=sd' a)po\ skoph=s o(rw=
to\ ploi=on. eu)/shmon ga\r ou)/ me lanqa/nei:
stolmoi/ te lai/fous kai\ pararru/seis new/s,
kai\ prw=|ra pro/sqen o)/mmasin ble/pous' o(do/n,
a)/gan kalw=s klu/ousa, toi=sin ou) fi/lh.
kai\ ta)/lla ploi=a pa=sa/ q' h( 'pikouri/a
eu)/preptos: au)th\ d' h(gemw\n u(po\ xqo/na
pro\s pra=gm' o(rw/sas tw=nde mh\ a)melei=n qew=n.
e)gw\ d' a)rwgou\s cundi/kous q' h(/cw labw/n.
i)/sws ga\r a)\n kh=ruc tis h)\ pre/sbh mo/loi,
a)ll' ou)de\n e)/stai tw=nde: mh\ tre/shte/ nin.
o(/mws d' a)/meinon, ei) bradu/noimen boh=|,
qa/rsei: xro/nw| toi kuri/w| t' e)n h(me/ra|
qeou\s a)ti/zwn tis brotw=n dw/sei di/khn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h(/kousi: mh=kos d' ou)de\n e)n me/sw| xro/nou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: poludro/mou fuga=s o)/felos ei)/ ti/ moi.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: qa/rsei, maxou=ntai peri\ se/qen, sa/f' oi)=d' e)gw/.
ma/xhs t' a)/plhston: kai\ le/gw pro\s ei)do/ta.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: pollou\s de/ g' eu(rh/sousin e)n meshmbri/as
mo/nhn de\ mh\ pro/leipe: li/ssomai, pa/ter.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: kalw=s a)\n h(mi=n cumfe/roi tau=t' w)= te/kna,
ei) soi/ te kai\ qeoi=sin e)xqairoi/ato.
ou) mh\ triai/nas ta/sde kai\ qew=n se/bh

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: a)ll' e)/sti fh/mh tou\s lu/kous krei/ssous kunw=n
ei)=nai: bu/blou de\ karpo\s ou) kratei= sta/xun.
w(s kai\ matai/wn a)nosi/wn te knwda/lwn

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: ou)d' o(/rmos, ou(= dei= peisma/twn swth/ria
e)s gh=n e)negkei=n, ou)d' e)n a)gkurouxi/ais
a)/llws te kai\ molo/ntes a)li/menon xqo/na
ou(/tw ge/noit' a)\n ou)d' a)\n e)/kbasis stratou=
kalh/, pri\n o(/rmw| nau=n qrasunqh=nai. su\ de\
fro/nei me\n w(s tarbou=sa mh\ a)melei=n qew=n:
pra/cas a)rwgh/n: a)/ggelon d' ou) me/myetai
po/lis ge/ronq', h(bw=nta d' eu)glw/ssw| freni/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: xqono/s, kelaino\n ei)/ ti keu=qo/s e)sti/ pou;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/fukton d' ou)ke/t' a)\n pe/loi kako/n:
patro\s skopai\ de/ m' ei(=lon: oi)/xomai fo/bw|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: po/qen de/ moi ge/noit' a)\n ai)qe/ros qro/nos,
pro\s o(\n ne/fh mudhla\ gi/gnetai xiw/n,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: lu/sima/ t' a)/xima/ t' e)/pide, pa/ter,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o/ o/ o/, a/ a/ a/:
su\ d' e)n nai\+ nai\+ ba/sh|

sp.speaker: *kh=rux
sp.l: i)/uze kai\ la/kaze kai\ ka/lei qeou/s.
lu/mas, a(=| su\ pro\ ga=s u(la/skwn

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: o(lkh\ ga\r ou)/toi plo/kamon ou)da/m' a(/zetai.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: ou) ga/r m' e)/qreyan, ou)d' e)gh/rasan trofh=|.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: ei) mh/ tis e)s nau=n ei)=sin ai)ne/sas ta/de,
e)pei\ ou)k a)kou/et' o)cu\ tw=n e)mw=n lo/gwn.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ou(=tos, ti/ poiei=s; e)k poi/ou fronh/matos
a)ll' h)= gunaikw=n e)s po/lin dokei=s molei=n;
kai\ po/ll' a(martw\n ou)de\n w)/rqwsas freni/.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: ti/ d' h)mpla/khtai tw=nd' e)moi\ di/khs a)/ter;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ce/nos me\n ei)=nai prw=ton ou)k e)pi/stasai.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: pw=s d' ou)xi/; ta)/m' o)lwlo/q' eu(ri/skwn a)/gw.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: qeoi=sin ei)pw\n tou\s qeou\s ou)de\n se/bh|.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: oi( d' e)nqa/d' ou)de/n, w(s e)gw\ se/qen klu/w;

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: a)/goim' a)/n, ei)/ tis ta/sde mh\ 'cairh/setai.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: kla/ois a)/n, ei) yau/seias, ou) ma/l' e)s makra/n.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ou) ga\r cenou=mai tou\s qew=n sulh/toras.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: a)ll' w(s a)\n ei)dw\s e)nne/pw safe/steron,—
kai\ ga\r pre/pei kh/ruk' a)pagge/llein torw=s
e(/kasta,—pw=s fw=, pro\s ti/nos t' a)faireqei\s
*)/arhs: to\ nei=kos d' ou)k e)n a)rgu/rou labh=|
ti/ soi le/gein xrh\ tou)/nom'; e)n xro/nw| maqw\n
ei)/sh| su/ t' au)to\s xoi) cune/mporoi se/qen.
tau/tas d' e(kou/sas me\n kat' eu)/noian frenw=n
a)/gois a)/n, ei)/per eu)sebh\s pi/qoi lo/gos.
toi/a de\ dhmo/praktos e)k po/lews mi/a
glw/sshs. komi/zou d' w(s ta/xist' e)c o)mma/twn.
ei)/h de\ ni/kh kai\ kra/th toi=s a)/rsesin.
a)ll' a)/rsena/s toi th=sde gh=s oi)kh/toras
eu(rh/set' ou) pi/nontas e)k kriqw=n me/qu.
u(mei=s de\ pa=sai su\n fi/lais o)pa/osi
kai\ dw/mat' e)sti\ polla\ me\n ta\ dh/mia,
dedwma/twmai d' ou)d' e)gw\ smikra=| xeri/.
e)/nq' u(mi/n e)stin eu)tu/kous nai/ein do/mous
pollw=n met' a)/llwn: ei) de/ tis mei/zwn xa/ris,
tou/twn ta\ lw=|sta kai\ ta\ qumhde/stata
a)stoi/ te pa/ntes, w(=nper h(/de krai/netai

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ to/pos eu)/frwn. pa=s tis e)peipei=n

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: qu/ein te lei/bein q', w(s qeoi=s, *)olumpi/ois,
kai/ mou ta\ me\n praxqe/nta pro\s tou\s e)ggenei=s
e)moi\ d' o)padou\s tou/sde kai\ dorusso/ous
kai\ mh\ 'c a)e/lptwn dorikanei= mo/rw| qanw\n
la/qoimi, xw/ra| d' a)/xqos a)ei/zwn pe/loi.
kai\ tau=q' a(/m' e)ggra/yasqe pro\s gegramme/nois
pa=s d' e)n metoi/kw| glw=ssan eu)/tukon fe/rei
kakh/n, to/ t' ei)pei=n eu)pete\s mu/sagma/ pws.
u(ma=s d' e)painw= mh\ kataisxu/nein e)me/,
qh=res de\ khrai/nousi kai\ brotoi/, ti/ mh/n;
pro\s tau=ta mh\ pa/qwmen w(=n polu\s po/nos
polu\s de\ po/ntos ou(/nek' h)ro/qh dori/,
mhd' ai)=sxos h(mi=n, h(donh\n d' e)xqroi=s e)moi=s
pra/cwmen. oi)/khsis de\ kai\ diplh= pa/ra

th
 me
 *pelasgo/s, th
 de\ kai\ po/lis didoi=,
to\ swfronei=n timw=sa tou= bi/ou ple/on.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)mh=s d' o)pw/ras ou(/nek' eu)= qa/rsei, pa/ter.
ei) ga/r ti mh\ qeoi=s bebou/leutai ne/on,
i)/xnos to\ pro/sqen ou) diastre/yw freno/s.
*ku/pridos d' ou)k a)melei= qesmo\s o(/d' eu)/frwn
fuga/dessin d' e)pipnoi/as kaka/ t' a)/lgh
o(/ ti/ toi mo/rsimo/n e)stin, to\ ge/noit' a)/n.
meta\ pollw=n de\ ga/mwn a(/de teleuta\
su\ de/ g' ou)k oi)=sqa to\ me/llon.
